user.title: Jaalee API Setup
user.description: Enter your Jaalee account email address.

code.title: Enter Verification Code
code.description: A verification code has been sent to **{email}**. Please enter it below. The code is valid for 60 seconds.

error.cannot_get_code: Failed to request a verification code. Please check your email address and try again.
error.invalid_or_expired_code: The verification code is invalid or has expired. Please go back and request a new one.
error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Jaalee API.

abort.already_configured: An account with this email is already configured.
